verses.roman:
sabāra jhyāṅṭāna bojhā ekatra karila
sabā haite prabhura bojhā adhika ha-ila

synonyms: sabāra—of all; jhyāṅṭāna—the dirt collected; bojhā—load; ekatra—combined in one place; karila—made; sabā haite—than all of them; prabhura bojhā—the pile of dirt collected by Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; adhika ha-ila—was greater.
translation: Even though all the devotees collected dirt in one pile, the dirt collected by Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was much greater.
